snippet: Mike D’Antoni, the former Knicks coach, is also on the Lakers’ shortlist. But the job is Phil Jackson’s if he wants it, said a person with knowledge of the process.
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni, the former Knicks coach, is also on the Lakers’ shortlist. But the job is Phil Jackson’s if he wants it, said a person with knowledge of the process.

headline.seo: Phil Jackson and Lakers Have Been Here Before
headline.main: Jackson and Lakers Have Passed This Way
headline.print_headline: Jackson and Lakers Have Passed This Way
